Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:35:43
Folder: C1039NV - mr. patrick chalhoub – dip warehouse shipments delivery plan & insurance
Message Count: 2

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1039NV_00
From: Geeta Manjal <Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com>
To: Bipin Madhavan Madassery <Bipin.Madassery@chalhoub.com>; Sanil Chandra <sanil@emoversuae.com>; Linton Crockford-Moore <lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com>; Ramanathan | Stonehaven <ram@stonehaven.ae>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>
CC: Ingie Chalhoub <Ingie.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; Yasir Panthakkal <yasir.panthakkal@etoilegroup.com>; Lali Das <Lali.Das@chalhoub.com>; Siddhi Joshi <siddhij@emoversuae.com>; Gordon | Stonehaven <gordon@stonehaven.ae>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-13 23:32
Subject: Mr. Patrick Chalhoub – DIP Warehouse Shipments: Delivery Plan & Insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

Good Day, 

 

Please find attached the Excel file and supporting documents for the shipments currently stored at our DIP warehouse.

 

I’m copying Mr. @Bipin Madhavan Madassery <mailto:Bipin.Madassery@chalhoub.com> , our warehouse contact at the DIP facility  ( contact number:  056-8564950), serve as the primary point of contact for the cargo collection.

chunks.text:
I’m copying Mr. @Bipin Madhavan Madassery <mailto:Bipin.Madassery@chalhoub.com> , our warehouse contact at the DIP facility  ( contact number:  056-8564950), serve as the primary point of contact for the cargo collection. 

 

Please coordinate with all recipients copied on this email thread to ensure smooth operations and timely delivery, following the schedule to be shared by @Linton Crockford-Moore <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> 

 

Hi @Bipin Madhavan Madassery <mailto:Bipin.Madassery@chalhoub.com>  
Please note that the shipments stored at DIP warehouse for Mr. Patrick Chalhoub, personal shipment will be collected by E-Movers. 

Your usual support in prioritizing the release of these shipments is highly appreciated, especially given the time constraints for delivery at the Nakheel site. Kindly inform us if there are any specific instructions to be followed during the collection process. Once the cargo is collected, we would be grateful if you could share the collection note with us.

 

Hi @Sanil Chandra <mailto:sanil@emoversuae.com> 
Please coordinate with Mr. Bipin at least one day in advance to arrange for loading at the DIP warehouse & other requirements if any.

Kindly share the signed POD of each shipment within the same day.

 

Additionally, for the gate pass, please coordinate with Ms. @Hiba Assaf <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>  and share the necessary documents to facilitate the required approval.

 

Hi @Linton Crockford-Moore <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com>

metadata.doc_id: C1039NV - mr. patrick chalhoub – dip warehouse shipments delivery plan & insurance\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1039NV - mr. patrick chalhoub – dip warehouse shipments delivery plan & insurance\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Additionally, for the gate pass, please coordinate with Ms. @Hiba Assaf <mailto:hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>  and share the necessary documents to facilitate the required approval.

 

Hi @Linton Crockford-Moore <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> 

As discussed during our call today, please refer to the attached list of shipments. We look forward to receiving the detailed delivery plan at your earliest convenience.

 

Hi @Ramanathan | Stonehaven <mailto:ram@stonehaven.ae>  / @Linton Crockford-Moore <mailto:lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com> 

We kindly request that you share photos of each shipment prior to offloading from the truck arranged by E-movers and again before these are unpacked. Please note that every shipment is assigned a unique Log ID, as detailed in the attached Excel file. We ask that this Log ID be included in all related communications to ensure clear reference and efficient tracking.

 

Hi @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

The shipment from the DIP warehouse is expected to be delivered to the villa starting next week. 

 

The detailed delivery schedule will be provided by Mr. Linton. In the meantime, I would appreciate your support in coordinating the required insurance coverage from Door DIP to Door Villa - including coverage for unpacking and assembly, as requested and necessary.

 

Lastly, thank you all for your ongoing support. Please don’t hesitate to reach out to me if you have any questions or need any assistance.

 

Regards

Geeta Manjal

To: jagath@emoversuae.com <jagath@emoversuae.com>; Bipin Madhavan Madassery <Bipin.Madassery@chalhoub.com>; Sanil Chandra <sanil@emoversuae.com>; Linton Crockford-Moore <lintoncrockfordmoore@gmail.com>; Ramanathan | Stonehaven <ram@stonehaven.ae>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Hiba Assaf <hiba.assaf@etoilegroup.com>

BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-17 11:56
Subject: RE: Mr. Patrick Chalhoub – DIP Warehouse Shipments: Delivery Plan & Insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All

 

Adding @jagath@emoversuae.com <mailto:jagath@emoversuae.com> 

 

Refer attached documents & list of the shipments @ DIP whse – contact details shared below

 

As discussed over WhatsApp, since the current pass remains valid until tomorrow, we would appreciate it if you could arrange for one of your staff members to inspect all the shipments listed in the attached document at the warehouse.

 

Please plan to begin loading one of the shipments tomorrow morning at 7:00 AM.

 

Due to the ongoing midday break regulations, the shipment must be offloaded and placed inside the villa before 12:00 PM.

chunks.text:
Please plan to begin loading one of the shipments tomorrow morning at 7:00 AM.

 

Due to the ongoing midday break regulations, the shipment must be offloaded and placed inside the villa before 12:00 PM.

 

Kindly arrange the necessary manpower, resources, tools and forklifts for both loading and offloading activities. 

 

Please also ensure that all passes for the manpower and forklifts are arranged on priority with validity upto maximum months

 

We request your confirmation at the earliest so we can proceed with the shipment tomorrow as planned.

 

Kindly refer 3rd Attachment with Delivery plan to Villa 

 

Thank you for your support and coordination.

 

Regards

 

 

GEETA MANJAL
